metadata.documentation: Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5 (CMIP5)
Earth System Grid Federation (ESGF)

The CMIP5 dataset includes the historical, RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 experiments for a subset of ESMs and a reduced number of predictors (both at surface and at pressure levels), commonly used for Statistical Downscaling (SD). This information has been prepared by the Santander MetGroup as part of the work done in the statistical downscaling portal (http://www.meteo.unican.es/downscaling), and is distributed in the framework of different international initiatives (such as CORDEX-ESD and VALUE) in order to have a standard predictor dataset and to facilitate the work of the contributing downscaling groups. This information has been downloaded from the ESGF at original resolution.

Data downloaded from ESGF at original resolution (http://pcmdi-cmip.llnl.gov/cmip5/index.html) on 15/06/2015 and stored in the User Data Gateway (UDG) of the Santander MetGroup climate services (http://meteo.unican.es/en/dataservices).
Dataset included in the User Data Gateway (UDG, http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki) maintained by the Santander MetGroup. Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset.
